Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is that it checks every alternate pair of elements in the array, instead of checking every pair of adjacent elements. This means that it will miss some pairs, leading to incorrect results. Generated Test cases 1-13 (13/18) should pass the buggy code, while test cases 14-18 (5/18) should fail the buggy code. The test cases 14-18 have been modified again to ensure that the value is not everywhere in the array.
